column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The girls are the front were super friendly and willing to help
column2: and they steered me in the direction of a carrot cake muffin. The muffin was amazing
column3: and the latte I consumed was equally pleasing
column4: both aesthetically and taste-wise. My friend and I sat at the 'bar
column5: ' and were thoroughly entertained by the baristas chatter (doesn't hurt when the staff is good looking either).
